item.description:
Need an excuse to study Arabic? Join us every other week on Sunday Morning at Bourbon Coffee shop in Porter Square Cambridge.

This is your opportunity to get to know others and:

1) Just bring whatever you're studying or chat in Arabic

2) Join some of us who are working on "Mastering Arabic 2" and "Easy Arabic Reader". The general format for the group is to start by reviewing any questions people have about the material.  Then we go around and take turns reading out loud and translating portions of the readings.

For 07/01/2012 we are doing the 7th reading in EasyArabic Reader.

 

Audio for Easy Arabic Reader is available free here: http://www.mhprofessional.com/templates/114-languages.php

 

Just click on the red "Launch" button.

We'll stay a couple hours then get lunch at a nearby restaurant if people are interested.
item.name: Sunday Morning Arabic Study Meetup
